description:
Steps to reproduce the issue:

nova boot ... vm1

Stop nova-compute on the node on which vm1 is running

Wait for the nova-compute service to be marked as "XXX" in "nova-manage service list"

nova delete vm1

Verify that the VM is not shown in "nova list"

Start the nova-compute service previously stopped.

Result:

The VM is still running on the host although marked as deleted in OpenStack.

No errors are reported.

Notes:

Tests have been performed using the Hyper-V driver, but the issue seems to be unrelated to the driver.
title: Deleting an instance when the nova-compute node is offline results in the VM still hanging on the host after restarting the nova-compute service

comments.content:
Solved by setting:

running_deleted_instance_action=reap

Note: the default interval for the following option is 1800 seconds. Why not a shorter interval like e.g.: 

running_deleted_instance_poll_interval=30
